meta.description: Optimize the number of orange and apple juice boxes to maximize vitamin D intake while meeting vitamin C requirements and preferences.

params.name: vitamin_d
params.description: Units of vitamin D per box of juice

params.name: vitamin_c
params.description: Units of vitamin C per box of juice

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of boxes of each type of juice to drink

constraints.name: apple_preference
constraints.description: At least 3 times as many apple juice boxes as orange juice boxes

constraints.name: max_vitamin_c
constraints.description: At most 300 units of vitamin C
